name: Qt Porn Collection Manager
short_description:
Video collection manager with tagging support and embedded player, profiled towards ease of use. Supports downloading adult videos from few sites. Developers can add extra sites by simple plugin interface.

It depends on libmwidgets, my other project (named libmrlwidget here).

Note: web search and downloading are  mostly not working,
I'm in process of re-writing this project from scratch, making it more modular and easy to integrate with other tools.

Core of new downloader will be called "Havoc toolkit" - libmrlwidgets, with some features added, fixed, refactored, etc.

Progress can be traced here:
https://bitbucket.org/nephre/havoc
